snippet.title: Windstorm: A Start of a Great Friendship Remastered - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Windstorm: A Start of a Great Friendship Remastered is a modern version of the horse simulation narrative game developed by Aesir Interactive based on the best-selling book and successful movie franchise. Players will experience the story of Mika, a girl known as a horse whisperer after she befriends a black stallion named Windstorm. Explore the beautiful world of Kaltenbach on horseback and tend to the needs of Windstorm to solidify the bond between horse and human. The remastered version used Unreal Engine 5 and takes full advantage of improved lighting, water effects, 4K Upsampling, and more. Windstorm: A Start of a Great Friendship Remastered is launching on June 20 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#Gaming #GameTrailers #Games
